title: Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site: Brochures
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Brochures            Publications and Brochures             Traveling Among the Navajo Learn basic cultural information about the Navajo people and proper etiquette for your travels throughout the Navajo Nation. This brochure will help you understand what you see and how to behave when interacting with the Dine'.          THE NAVAJO LONG WALK - HWEELDI (PDF 192 kb) Select this informative site bulletin to learn the story of the "Navajo Long Walk", the incarceration of the Dine' between 1864 - 1868.         CHURRO SHEEP (PDF 143 kb) Hubbell Trading Post NHS is participating in the re-establishment of the Churro Sheep breed on the Navajo Nation. This site bulletin provides information about the program and history and characteristics about the breed.      Informational site bulletins about John Lorenzo Hubbell are now available: French (194 KB)   German (2,202 KB)
